title: Unable to remember account information from season 1 to get my account back
body:
About 2 weeks ago someone logged into my account and started playing ranked games, I was away for a week so unable to get to a LoL client but i was able to email riot and in what seems like my stupidity, i asked for a temp ban until i was able to come back in a week and sort out my account. Now i am being asked to verify i am the original creator of my account but all the verification questions are very hard to answer as my account is about 5 years old and have owned all champs for a long time so hard to remember who my first champ was and what my first RP purchase was. I have spent alot of time money and energy on this account and i would really like someone from Riot to be able to work with me to get it back.

I have been trying to use the support ticket system but the only replies i get are "our information doesnt match please try remember more and email me if you do" - I have many other ways i could prove it is my account but no one is working with me to help and it feels like riot are making it harder with every email i send them

-The guy never changed my password, i can still log in kind of, allthough i get the account banned/suspended pop up
-my email has been verrified with my league of legends account since 2014 when they gave out the 4win ip boost (I still have this email)
-my account has never had any security issues and i have never had to email riot or create a support ticket before

Any ideas from any other summoners, or ideally some proper help from a riot staff (And not just telling me to create a ticket) would be very much appreciated, my account means a lot to me and I would forever be grateful for any help i can get

I have many people that would vouch for me and records would show ive been playing with most of these people since season 1/2

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

I understand how hard some of this information can be to dig up from memory.

Do you currently have an open ticket with Player Support? Could you provide me the ticket number so I can see what I can dig up for you.

>
> Hey there,
> 
> I understand how hard some of this information can be to dig up from memory.

> Do you currently have an open ticket with Player Support? Could you provide me the ticket number so I can see what I can dig up for you.

Hi there, yes i currently have had this support ticket open for 2 weeks (#23161765).

I understand that you take account security seriously but surely you are able to tell it is my account and i cant be the first person to forget how he created his account :( i am not getting any replys on the support ticket that are answering my questions but possibly because i am getting very upset over this and loosing my cool :( 

I am still currently searching the house for any old RP cards that might of been kicked under a couch or trying to find an old RP transaction on an old bank account


Thank you for any help

Apologies for the delayed response.

While I can't provide any updates on your case here, I would recommend you continue your correspondence with Player Support through that ticket :)
